mapper.insert: insert into note (sender, receiver, subject, content, time, checking) values (#{sender}, #{receiver}, #{subject}, #{content}, CURRENT_TIMESTAMP, 1)
mapper.select: select t1.*, t3.profile_name from note t1 join member t2 on t1.receiver = t2.nick left join img_profile t3 on t2.profile_num = t3.profile_num where sender = #{sender}
select t1.*,t2.nick, t3.profile_name from note t1 join member t2 on t1.sender = t2.m_id left join img_profile t3 on t2.profile_num = t3.profile_num where note_num=#{note_num}
select t1.*, t2.nick, t3.profile_name from note t1 join member t2 on t1.sender = t2.m_id left join img_profile t3 on t2.profile_num = t3.profile_num where receiver = #{receiver}
select count(*) from note where checking = 1 and receiver = #{receiver}
select t1.*, t2.nick from note t1 join member t2 on t1.sender = t2.m_id where checking = 1 and receiver = #{receiver} limit 2
